column2: Would you say [fill: your/ALIAS’s] health in general is excellent, very good, good, fair, or poor?
column80: Sometimes people take tobacco out of a traditional cigar, cigarillo or filtered cigar and replace it with marijuana. This is sometimes called a “blunt”.  Have you ever smoked part or all of a traditional cigar, cigarillo or filtered cigar with marijuana in it?  (Remember all information you give to the PATH Study will be kept private.)
column158: [Sometimes people take tobacco out of a traditional cigar, cigarillo or filtered cigar and replace it with marijuana. This is sometimes called a “blunt”.]  In the past 12 months, have you smoked part or all of a traditional cigar, cigarillo or filtered cigar with marijuana in it? [(Remember all information you give to the PATH Study will be kept private.)]
column236: Now think about the past 12 months when you smoked traditional cigars, cigarillos or filtered cigars.  In the past 12 months, how often was any of the tobacco replaced with marijuana?
